valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Plymouth 973 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 in south. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 in south.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough or high. in northeast, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, sleet or snow. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate to very poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
21:54 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 continuing
